thread.title: Gigi Hadid wears ring on THAT finger after declaring Zayn Malik the 'love of her life'
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid wears ring on THAT finger after declaring Zayn Malik the 'love of her life'

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Gigi Hadid wears ring on THAT finger after declaring Zayn Malik the 'love of her life'
text:
Gigi Hadid wears ring on THAT finger after declaring Zayn Malik the 'love of her life' The model and her boyfriend were all smiles as they were pictured in Paris on Tuesday Share Gigi Hadid proudly sports a ring on her wedding finger (Photo: Fameflynet/WireImage) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Gigi Hadid was spotted wearing a ring on THAT finger as she appeared at a show during Paris Fashion Week on Tuesday. 
The Victoria's Secret stunner was spotted leaving her hotel in the City of Love with her other half before making an appearance at the launch of the new collection by Tommy Hilfiger and herself. 
Gigi, who was dressed casually in items from the line, stopped to pose for pictures - and also happily flashed the gold finger jewellery, which could be a promise ring from her beau. 
Following the launch, the smitten pair were then spotted walking hand-in-hand to the after party at La Perousse restaurant. Zayn Malik & Gigi Hadid (Photo: Splash News) Model Gigi Hadid (Photo: WireImage) Read More 
The same day, Gigi - who has been in France since last week for the fashion extravaganza - publicly declared her love for her other half on social media. Model Gigi Hadid (Photo: WireImage) Model Gigi Hadid (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
She shared a picture of the former One Direciton star sticking out his tongue while wearing Mickey Mouse hands. 
"Love of my life," the 21-year-old beauty wrote across it. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
